topic: How to benchmark web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to benchmark web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Benchmarking Web Backends with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to use the FastAPI framework along with Python 3.12+ for benchmarking web backends to optimize performance.
key_points: Use built-in FastAPI tools to measure response times
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for proper operation of the aforementioned code.
FastAPI version 0.74.0 or higher is recommended for using the built-in benchmarking features.
caveats: Benchmarks may vary depending on hardware, system configuration, and network conditions.
This guide demonstrates basic benchmarking techniques; real-world scenarios may require more advanced optimizations.
